result:
@require '~@theme/styles/variables'

$headerBgHeight = 150px
$avatarHeight = 120px

.info-card
  padding 0
  a
    color $grayTextColor
    font-weight normal
  .info-card-header
    height $headerBgHeight
    margin-bottom $avatarHeight * 0.5
    .info-avatar
      display block
      width $avatarHeight
      height $avatarHeight
      margin 0 auto
      border 3px solid #fff
      border-radius 50%
      box-shadow: 0 0 2px alpha(black, 0.2)
      transform translateY($headerBgHeight - $avatarHeight * 0.5)
  .info-card-body
    cursor default
    padding 1rem
    border-bottom 1px solid $borderColor
    text-align center
    .info-nickname
      display block
      font-size 1.5rem
      font-weight bold
      text-align center
    .info-desc
      margin 1rem 0
    .info-contact
      color $grayTextColor
      word-break break-all
      line-height 160%
      .icon
        fill $grayTextColor
  .info-card-footer
    text-align center
    padding 1rem
